div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem per balliuos xxv die
Junij anno ut supra

The samyne day Dauid prat the gret bodely aith' suorne deponit be his
aith' that patrik scherale duellande in the paris' of logydurnocht is avand'
to thome gray in the parys' of Deir j stane of woll and nay siluer

div.head: Nomina assise ad Inquisicionem georgij heruy
div.p:
Alexander de camera Robertus blinsell Dauid menyeis Junior alexander rede Willelmus
abirdour Andreas branche Willelmus blinsell Dauid matheson Andreas
Wentone gilbertus moreson thomas mar' Jacobus crake Robertus
prat Willelmus moir' senior et Dauid galichtly qui Jurati dicunt quod quondam
Jacobus heruy pater georgij'j' overwrites 'u'. heruy
latorum latoris presencium obiit vltimo vestitus et
saisitus ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis de quadam terra
Jacente infra dictum burgum ex parte boriali vici tendentis a foro publico versus
domum sancte trinitatis inter terram que fuit olim Richardi Rudirfude ex orientali
ex vna et communionem viam Regiam que Itur ab orientali cono eiusdem vici
ecclesie per torrentem siue Ripam torrentis ab aque ductis molendinorum
decurrentis ex occidentali partibus ex altera Et quod dictus georgius est le
gittimus et propinquior heres quondam dicti georgij Jacobi patris suj de dicta
terra cum pertinenciis et quod est legittime etatis Et quod dicta terra cum pertinenciis valet nunc
per annum v s' et tantum valuit tempore pacis et quod tenetur in de Capite de domino nostro
Rege per seruicium burgale Et nunc exisitit in manibus domini thome heruy cap
ellanj suj auunculi pro toto tempore vite sue racione liberi tenementi per quondam
appunctuamentum inter dictum dominum thomam et quondam Jacobum heruy fratrem suum initum et
tractatum datum et clausum sub sigillo thome fyff balliui et sigillo quorundam
qui Inquisicionj huic Intererant faciende anno die mense et loco suprascriptis

the samyne day it was fundyne and deliuerit be ane assis' alexander rede
forspekar that Androw lammyngtone sal pay to Dauid quhit sone and ayr
to gilbert quhit lvij s' scottis money quhilk the saide Androw borrouit
fra his modir And thar salbe caucione fundyne to the said Androw to kepe
him skathtles of the saide siluer / the quhilk siluer the balyeis chargit the
saide Androu to pay within terme of law

In the court haldin be the balyeis the xxvij day of June forsaid
the aldirman and balyeis chargit James of Kyntor to comper befor
tham to morne to ansuer as law wile tile allane beltmakar burges
of elgyne for certan gudis deliuerit to the saide James and Agnes his spous'
in keping' And' the said Allan protestit for his costis and skathis as for the
principale gudis

In the Court haldin be the balyeis the xxviij day of June the
yer' forsaide the balyeis assignit to James of Kyntor' monunday
cum xv dais to ansuer to allane beltmakar burges of elgyne and to
ane borghe strekit be him apon the said James and Agnes his spous'
for the wranguys' haldin fra him of certane merchandis' that is to say
j brew caldrone of xxxv gallonnis or tharby tua barrelis of saip xlviij
flemys pundis of waxe or tharby demi barrel of S vynaker the said'
allan payand' to tham ane certan some of Siluer

div.head: Curia legalis
div.p:
In the Court haldin within the tolbutht of Abirdene the xxiij day of July
the yer forsaide Jhone malisone grantit to releif and keipe Androu branche
skathles' anent xxti li' gret for the quhilkis the saide androw was bundin for him
to lorde Androu bischoipe of murray

Eodem die Jacobus Kyntor super quem Dauid galichtly inuenit plegium pro
iniusta detencione ix barellarum calcis ab eo primo die vocatus ad comparendum et
respondendum dicto plegio non comparuit Ideo precipitur Duncano straloche seriando quod
capto distracto ab eodem ipsium summoneat ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam
secundum die processus

Eodem die thomas mar' super quem thomas quhit porrexit plegium
pro iniusta arrestacione vnius dolij wadij recepcione eiusdem de naui
le Wyllekyne in Camfeir' ac recepcione xxxijti s' g' super Idem ab eodem
primo die vocatus ad comparendum et respondendum dicto plegio non comparuit Ideo precipitur
Duncano straloche seriando quod prius capto districto ab eodem ipsium summoneat
ad proximam Curiam legalem tanquam secundum diem processus
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxiiij die Julij anno quo supra

Allane beltmakar' burges of elgyne producit certane witnes vndir
writin to beir' leile witnessing in the actione' movit betuix him and James
of Kyntor burges of abirdene tueching a caldrone certane wax and saipe
with the quhilkis the said James Intrometit belangand' to the said' alan And forthir
tueching certan vynacre clamit be the said' allane eftir the tenor' of ane decret
gevin be Jhone of Knollis Robert blindsel and mastir Androw cadiow that is to
say thomas prat the first witnes suorne the gret bodely aith' and ixaminit
deponit and declarit be his aith' that James of Kyntor sal pay to alane beltmakar
xiij s' and iiijor d' for Ilkan stane of waxe that the said alan preuys sufficientlie that he
resavit or Intromettit with of his Alsua he has deponit be his aith' that the said
James sale pay xlij d' of Scottis money to the said alan for Ilkan gallone that
the caldrone clamyt be him contenit as the forsaid alane cane sufficiently
preyf And' atour the saide thomas has deponit be his aith' that the saide
James sal pay to the forsaide alane fywe li' of scottis money for ij barrelis of saipe
that he Intromettit with of his Alsua Androw murray eldar William symson henry
hourvm Jhone of glenmaluyn Richerd hill the fadir William portar Symon'
gardin and Jhon' malisone the gret bodely aith' suorne and examinit concor
danly has deponit be thar' aithis in al thingis concording with the
saide thomas prat and deposicone

In the balye court of abirdene haldin be the balyeis of the samyn in
the tolbutht of abirdene the xxiiij day of July forsaid et cetera

expan.note: This marginal heading is placed page 23.

div.p:
The samyne day it was fundin decretit and deliuerit be the aldirman
and part of the counsale present with him for the tyme that alane beltmakar'
burges of elgyne sal preif sufficiently befor him within the terme contenit
in the decret gevin betuix him and James of Kyntor how mony pundis
the pece of waxe deliuerit be him to the saide James contenit And' thareftir'
the said James sal pay him xxti d' for Ilkan punde that he resavit Alsua
the said James sale preif within the terme of the said decret how mony
gallonnys' the caldrone that he resavit fra the said' alane contenit Ande
falyeing of the preif within the saide terme he sale ansuer to the said alane
for xxxv gallonnys and sal pay for Ilkan gallone xlij d' Alsua it was
fundin' and decretit that the said' James sal pay to the said alan fywe lib' of
vsual scottis money for' the saidis tua barrellis of saipe And' anent the
vynaker thai referrit it to the decret gevin tharapone obefor' And' this
somez to be pait within the terme contenit in the said decret

Eodem die Alanus beltmakar' fecit constituit creauit et nominauit thomam
Waus suum procuratorem in premiss' in vberiore forma procuratorij cum omnibus
terminis ad hoc necessariis et oportunis promittens de Rato et grato et cetera

In the bailye Court haldin the thrid day of august the yer forsaide thomas
rollande grantit that he sale comper one monunday next to cum as day
of peremptour' and thane he sal ethir deny or gravnt that he come souerte
to keipe Jhone James of Kyntor skathtles anent ane caldrone clamit be
allane beltmakar' burges of elgyne

the samyne day thomas quhit comperit and grantit that he sal cum one the
next monunday and deliuer to Robert quhit his seile and his chartiris that
he has of his and sale discharge him of tutory of Dauid quhit sone to
vmquhile gilbert quhit And' of ale Intromettingis that he has tharin

the samyn day it was fundin and sufficiently preuyt befor the aldirman that the
pece of wax pertening to allane beltmakar that James of Kyntor resauit
contenit xlij pundis and the saide allane has defaltyt iiijor li' and sua the said'
James sal pay him for xxxviij li' Alsua the said' James sal pay him
iiijor d' and j twyme barrell for the Rottyne barrell of vinaker that was
left with him
Curia legalis tenta in pretorio per balliuos quinto sexto die Augusti anno quo supra

the samyne day the aldirman causit alexander chamer officiar' charge
be his wand James of Kyntor' to reman and abide within the tolbutht
quhil he pait to allan beltmakar' al somes contenit in ane decret
gevin betuix thame be Jhone of Knollis Robert blinsel and mastir Androw
Cadiow at commavnd' of my lorde Justice

the samyne day Robert quhit eftir the resat of his Seile and chartiris
fra thome quhit he protestit gif ony lettres evidencis or writis was
maide vndir his said sele that thai turne him nor his ayris to nay
preiudice And' atour he Revokit Renuncit and cessit the samyn

The samyne day it was deliuerit be ane assis' James of leslie forspekar
that thome rollande allegit that James of Kyntor hade resauit pament
for the caldrone clamit be allan beltmakar' be the handis of thome of
Cullan and be him self And thai deliuerit and ordanit that the said thomas rolland
sal ger summonde the said thome of cullan be the ordinaris lettres to comper befor
the aldirman and balyeis within this tolbutht one friday cum viij dais And gif
the saidis thomas and thomas sueris the gret bodely aith' that thai gaf pa
ment to the said James for the said caldrone thome the saide thomas
rollande is quyt of his challance tharanent And falyeing' tharof at sic termez
as the assis' has gevin him the saide thomas sal relef h the said James
of the saide caldrone

Curia balliuorum tenta per balliuos in pretorio eiusdem xiijo die Augusti
anno quo supra

the quhilk day mathow wricht tuk vpone him
to entir James libertone befor the balyeis within the tolbutht this day thre
oulkis to ansuer' to William andirsone and tile a borghe strekit apon'
him for v s' and ix d' wranguislie haldin fra him becaus' the said mathow
come souerte obefor for the saide James to the saide William

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem xiiij die Augusti anno
quosupra

the quhilk day James Colesone accusit for strubulance
denyit quhilk was put tile ane assis' quhilkis suorne fande and
the moutht of Dauid menyeis yongar forspekar the saide James quyt
distrubulance thir ar the namys of the assis' Dauid menyes yongar James of le
Colesone Androw branche William Kintor J'J' overwrites 'D'.ames of Kintor henry ourvm Wil a
thome gardin' alexander scrogis and Duncan smytht

xvio die mensis augusti anno quosupra Allanus litstar inuenit Willelmum
philp plegium legalem quod Andreas litstar et pars sua erunt Indempnes pro
eo et parte sua aliter quos per viam Juris Et singuliter Idem Andreas inuenit gilbertum
moresone plegium legalem quod dictus allanus et pars sua erunt indempnes
pro eo et parte sua aliter quam per viam Juris

In the bailye Court of Abirdene haldin within the tolbutht of the samyn the
xvij day of August the yer forsaide thomas rollande the gret bodely
aith' suorne declarit in the actione of the caldrone depending' betuix
him and James of Kintor that he knew nocht that James of Kintor salde the
said caldrone to the larde of Innes Alsua the said thomas deponit that
he and thome of Cullan gaf xvij inglis grotis at the lest to the saide
James for the saide Caldrone and knavis na mair' in this matir

Thomas Cullan suorne deponit be his aitht he knew nocht that euire
James of Kintor sald' the saide Caldrone nor he gaf neuire penny
to the saide James for the saide Caldrone bot he saw I thome rollande
gif him Certane Inglis grotis

The quhilk day the balyez for waknes' of the Court continevit this
matir in al strintht force and effect quhil the morne the xviij day
of this instant' monetht

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem in pretorio xviijo die
augusti anno ut supra

the samyn day it was fundin ande deliuerit be
warde of the court that thomas rollande sal relef ande freith' James
of Kyntor of ane caldrone follouit and optenit be alane beltmakar'
apone the saide James eftir the deliuerance of ane assis' gaue obefor
as in the act maide tharapone mair' fullie is contenit the saide James
refunding' to the saide thomas xvij inglis grotis

the saide day Duncan straloche seriande at commavnde of the balye chargit
the saide thomas rolland to reman in the tolbutht quhil he fande
Souerte to relef the saide James of the forsaide caldrone

The quhilk day James of Kintor resignit his landis liande in the
gallougat one the west part of the samyn betuix the lande of alexander sanchar'
one the southt and the lande of Androw baxtar one the northt in the handis of
thomas fyf balye to be demanyt as law wile for the pament of the siluer aucht
to alane beltmakar befor thir witnes Androw branche William blinsel Dauid mar'
sere Robert leis and alexander traile

the samyn day thomas rollande resignit in the handis of the saide balye
ane annuell rent of tene s' for the pament of the saide caldrone of the
land of vmquhil Walter pyot liand' one the northt part of the land
of vmquhile Richerde of Kintor in the gallougat befor thir witnes
alexander traile morice bissat Duncan straloche and Androw branche

James be the grace of gode kinge of Scottis To the aldirman balyeis
Consale officiaris and communite of our' burghe' of Abirdene greting for samekle'
as we haue vndirstandin that in tyme bigan thar has bene gret vexacion
and trubule ymangis you throu the chesin of your officiaris and fre disposicion of the
common' gude of our saide burghe It is our' wile herfor and we charge you stratlie
and commandis that in tyme to cum ye cheis nane officiaris within our saide burghe' be the
supplicacion charge nor menys' of ouris nor of nane vthir personis bot be
haile electione of the communite ye frely cheis' sic officiaris within our said burghe
as salbe knavyn maist ayfaldly set for the common' gude and profit tharof ande
for gude of merchandice vndir al the hieast payne charge and offens' that ye and Ilkan
of you may committ and inryne in that part agan our' maieste And atour that yhe
ande your thesaurar' comper befor our' Justice and A Reuerende fadir in gode and
our trast consalour' William bischop of abirden' your prelate and the Remanent of the
lordis that we haue now sende to our' Justice ayr' of abirden' ande gif thaim full
Compt and rekning of the disposicion of the commone' gude of our said burghe
ande certify tham but dissimiliation in quhais handis at the samyn is in
say that we may tharthrow consider and knaw in quhome the falt has
bene and Is and mak reformacione to be hade tharapone as efferis Ande
that ye cheis' your saide thesaurar' in tyme to cum be haile and sic electione
of the comunite of our saide burghe and nayne vthir ways vndir the charge forsaid
gevin vndir our' Signet at Edinburghe the last day of June And'
of our Regne the xxvij yer' James R et cetera quhilk letter
Androw murray has in kepin

the xx day of August the yer forsaid thir personis vndir writin that is
to say thomas mar' Androw branche James Colison thomes simson James
of Kintor Duncan smitht and Jhone of lammyntone suorne the gret bodely aith'
at commavnd of thomas fif ane of the balyeis eftir the tenour of the
kingis lettres direkit to him tharapon Anent the vale of half a last of hidis
waring optenit be William blinsell apon William mar fand and deliuerit the
vaile of the samyn extending' to xxv markis And thai allouit xlv g'
of ode money to the said William moris fee

the xxij day of August the yer forsaide James Kintor' comperit befor
thomas fif ane of the ballieis of Abirdene in the tolbutht and grantit him avand'
to Wat of auchnef fiwe li' and iiijor s' vsual money of Scotland for certan
merchandice pait and deliuerit to allan beltmakar for him quhilk he oblist
him be the fatht of his body to pay to the said Walter at michaelmes
next eftir follouing And falyeing' tharof to pay thre barrellis of Salmond'
at the next fischinge thareftir follouing but lang' delay fraud or gile

The samyn day the belman at the commavnd of the commissaris of the assedacion
passit throw the toune and chargit ale personis avande ony grosomis to
comper one the morne be ix houris in the tolbutht bringand' with him thaim
thar girsomis and to heir' the assedacione rede And' falyeing' tharof thai
wald' dispone apone thar takis for pament of the Salmond' aucht to the
kinge

the xxiij day of August the yer forsaid the aldirman and diuers' of the Consell
present for the tyme for the gude of Sanct nicholes' werk assignit to mastir
Jhone gray mastir masone the mailis of James lesleis half nethis fisching'
of the Raike and the malis of Jhone tolesonez half nethis fisching' of the Raik
quhile the queir be biggit And to begyne at the next martimes the tane
half in pament And the tothir half at Witsonday thareftir And say furtht
termly and yerlie quhil the queir' be bigit And the aldirman and consal grantit
tham to keip the saidis James and Jhone fre of al assignacionis maid obefor
to the erle marscheal or til ony vthiris

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem per balliuos xxvijo die mensis
augusti anno quo supra

the quhilk day Marione glenny and Williame
young ob grantit tham to stande and abid at the Consale of mastir Androw
lial thesaurar of abirdene and mastir alexander lindesay prebendar of balheluy James
leslie and Jhone Colisone anent ony discrepance of the land liand in the
gallougat occurring' amang tham

div.head: Nomina assise ad Inquisicionem Willelmi younge
div.p:
Alexander chamer de merchil Jacobus leslie Robertus blinsel Dauid menyes
Johannes Colisone Jhones' Johannes
of Cullan Johannes of Knollis Willelmus blinsell
Andreas branche gilbertus mvresone et gilbertus chamer quj Jurati
dicunt quod quondam dominus Walterus young frater Willelmi yonge latoris
presencium obiit vltimo vestitus et saisitus ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem
domini nostri Regis de terra anteriore Jacente infra burgum de abirden' in vico
furcarum ex orientali parte eiusdem vici inter terram Dauid lousone ex boreali
ex vna et terram quondam gilberti leche ex australi partibus ex altera terram ma
riote glenny ex orientali et communionem viam regiam ex occidentali Et dictus Willelmus
et legittimus et propinquior heres dicti quondam domini Walteri fratris sui de predicta
terra cum pertinenciis et quod est legittime etatis Et quod dicta terra valet nunc per annum xiij
s' et iiijor d' et tantum valuit tempore pacis Et quod tenetur de Suppremo domino
nostro Rege in libero burgagio per seruicium burgale et nunc existit in manibus domini
nostri regis per spacium vnius mensis aut eacirca in defectu veri heredis Jus suum
nomine prosequentis datum et clausum et cetera

The thride day of September the yer forsaide In presens of the aldirman and balyeis
Jonhe' steuinsone grantit to pay thome Wode of Edinburghe a stand' of harnes
and j barrele of Salmonde eftir the tenor' of his obligacion' thar schevin and rede
And morice byssat seriand' at charge of the balyeis chargit be his wand the
saide Jonhe' to pay the saide harnes and Salmond' within terme of law

Eodem die thomas Wode burgensis edinburgi fecit constituit et creauit Johannem ruthirfurd
militem et Robertum blinsel coniunctim et diuisim suos legittimos procuratores ad petendum et recipiendum
a Johanne stevinson certa arma et vnam barellam salmonum et Inde acquitan' ac in aliis
suis agendis promittend' de Rato et grato

Eodem die comparuit Agnes relicta quondam Ade Craufurde et produxit ac presente perlegi fecit quoddam
Instrumentum manuali subscriptione domini Roberti leis notarij publici Sigillis dicti Ade et Dauid
menyeis Juris Sigillat' contumen' quod ipsa sasita fuit in duabus terris ipsius ade quarum
vna Jacet in vico superiore ecclesie et alia ad caput vici castri protestan' solempniter
quod pretensa sasina alias exhibita heredi dicti Ade non cedat sibi in preiudicium quo ad suam
convinctam Infeodacionem dictarum terrarum
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio Septimo die Septembris anno quo supra

Quo die comparuit dominus thomas heruy capellanus et Solempniter protestatus fuit
quod sasina alias georgio heruy suo consanguineo exhibita de terra Jacente propre dominum sancte
trinitate non cedat sibi in preiudicium

Eodem die compertum fuit per Inquisicionem quod magister Richardus craufurde est legittimus
et propinquior heres quondam Ade craufurd patris suj

Eodem die Walterus auchneywe et Willelmus blinsel se summiserunt ad standum
constitucioni Alexandri chamer Junioris et domini Johannis Stirueling penes clameum vnius
annuli aurei calumpniati per dictum Willelmum

Eodem die magister Richardus craufurd solempniter protestatus fuit quod nullus balliuus ad
terram suam accederet in suum preiudicium dumodo premuniretur ad quod balliui concesserunt

the saide day It was fundin and deliuerit be ane assis' alexander rede forspekar
that alexander menyes is awand' and sal pay to Will blinsel four barrellis salmond'
he deliueringe him fiwe flemis eln' of birgis gray

the saide day James andirson' burges of the said' burghe' producit in Jugement befor
thomas fyf ane of the balyes in Jugement ane letter of Sesin vndir the said
balyes sele of Robert andirsonis entre in ane berne with a tale liand' in the
gallougat one the est part of the samyn betuix the land' of Androw murray
one the northt and the landis of William Wricht and William scharp one the
southt Ande ane chartir of plane alienacion of the samyn mad' be the saide
Robert vndir his sel with consent of Agnes Kynnoir' his modir thomas simson
and Jonet fechat his spous' vndir the selis of the said' thomas and balye And'
ane testimonale of Sesin tharapone vndir the said' ballieis sele

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvijmo
die Septembris anno quosupra

the samyn day Androw andirsone grantit him avand' to richerd hil the fadir
xvij s' et vj d' et viij s' to Richerd' hill the sone quhilkis the balyeis
chargit him to pay within terme of law

the saide day Edmonde hay grantit him awand' to Jonhe' retre xij s' for his
hous' maile

Eodem die thomas narne conuictus fuit per assisam pro perturbio Willelmi lammynton' et Idem
Willelmus in Amerciamento Curie pro perturbio dicti thome in verbo et dictus thomas soluet
pro satifactione partis et burgi dimidii libre cere ad lumen sancti sanguinis et si aliquis ipsorum conuictus
fuerit pro perturbio alterius soluet ad fabricam ecclesie xx s'

Eodem die Andreas simson conuictus fuit per assisam pro perturbio henrici hourum
et Idem henricus similiter conuictus pro perturbio dicti Andree / Et quia dictus Andreas reperitur
Inceptor perturbij ac prouocator soluet domino Dauid Waus ad fabricam ecclesie restum
quinque marcarum non solutum / ac quilibet ipsorum ad lumen sancti sanguinis librum cere
Et si aliquis ipsorum alterum perturbet in postrum Soluet ad fabricum ecclesie decim li'
Insuper Alexander rede deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus henricus erit Indempnis de
prefato Andrea aliter quam per viam iuris Et alexander nachty pro dicto henrico quod
ipse Andreas erit Indempnis pro eo aliter quam per viam Juris et Ipsi obligatur ad
conseruandum suos plegios Indempnes de huiusmodi fideiussione

the saide day it was ordanit be the aldirman and consal that Anny bynne sulde
be warnit be ane officiar to comper befor tham one the next Wednisday
to schew hir richtis of the landis of vmquhil Adam craufurde schevinge
hir quethir scho comperit or nocht thai wald minster Justice in that matir

the samyne day morice byssat sergeande at commavnde of the balyeis chargit
Alexander traile to remane within the tolbutht quhile he Set souerte to pay to
thomez mar tua pundis gretis optenit in the chavmerlane ayre last
bigan to pait eftir the erast Schip saylande out of abirdene cum in flandris
and falyeinge of ane tile ane vthir

Eodem die Alexander de camera Alexander menyes et Dauid menyes electi fuerunt
commissarij ad proximum parleamentum

the samyne day it was ordanit be the aldirman and thir personis follouing that is
to say Alexander of chamer James leslie Robert blinsele Jonhe' colison' Alexander rede
Jonhe' of Culan Dauid menyeis Androw murray commissaris of the assedacion' Ande
be thomas prat Alexander chamer the Sone Androw branche Androw Culan eldar
and Androw Wentone that the iij li' iij s' iiij d' of the maile of ane Sexpart
of the crovis beinge in the handis of gilbert Kintorris ayris salbe put in the
handis of thomez prat to freithe the last yeris maile of the saide fischinge
that the said' Androw may haue fre entre to the samyn

xxiiij die Septembris Anno quosupra Alexander mar deuenit plegius
legalis quod Johannes malisone erit Indempnis pro andrea andirson'
aliter quam per viam Juris Et Jacobus colison' deuenit plegius legalis
quod sepedictus Andreas erit indempnis pro prefato Johanne aliter quam
per viam Juris et obligatur fide media ad conseruandum plegios
suos Indempnes de huiusmodi fideiussione
